stories.original_summary: JWST has revealed a strange early universe filled with ultra-bright “blue monster” galaxies, mysterious “little red dots,” and black holes that seem far too massive for their age. stories.fantasy_headline: Shadow Stars May Unravel Ancient Sky Mysteries!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Seers, peering into the ancient scrying pool, have observed puzzling blue sky-beasts and tiny red beacons. Some void maws appear far too immense for their age. Now, wise wizards propose that shadow stars, fueled by unseen essence, could explain these cosmic enigmas from the dawn of creation.

stories.fantasy_headline: Master Artificer Joins Royal Apple Guild!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Sebastiaan, a renowned artificer known for his exquisite enchanted lenses and scrying orbs from the Luxmiths' Clan, has joined the Royal Apple Guild. He announced his excitement to work with the finest crafting circle in the realm, creating beloved new artifacts for all.

stories.fantasy_headline: Lord Zuckerberg Shifts Focus to Sentient Magic!
stories.fantasy_story: Chief Merchant Lord Zuckerberg of the Meta Guild has unveiled a new vision for his realm. His grand dreams of the Shadow Realm are now replaced by enchanted chronicles, woven by sentient spirits. At the recent Guild Assembly, Lord Zuckerberg declared that sentient magic will make tale-telling more enchanting and responsive than ever before.
